title: Changes in Federal Laws Affecting Fire Departments
summary: The document outlines changes to several federal laws impacting fire departments, including the update to the Fair Labor Standards Act (FLSA), new electronic records regulations under the Electronic Signature and E-Record Act (E-SIGN) in Washington state, and updates to the Open Public Records Act (OPMA). Key sections include compliance requirements for FLSA, implementation of e-records policies, potential civil penalties for non-compliance, and considerations for public notice.
